nodes.text: Bimm mustard was a type of mustard that the Besalisk Dexter Jettster enjoyed the taste of and used in Dex's Diner, his restaurant on the planet of Coruscant, before the business was destroyed at some point in the first two years of the Galactic Empire's rule. It would be served upon request alongside any slider on the menu.

Bimm mustard is mentioned in a Hyperspace-exclusive release, "Dining at Dex's" by Gregory Walker, which represents the in-universe menu of Dex's Diner. "Bimm" is the name of two species, one furred and the other Near-Human, found in the Star Wars galaxy. However, no definitive connection between the condiment and either of them is established in Walker's work.
